jinngine.physics
Interface Scene

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultScene
public interface Scene

Main interface for using Jinngine. Use Scene to insert and remove triggers, bodies, geometries, forces, and constraints.

addLiveConstraint

void addLiveConstraint(Constraint c)
Add a live constraint. A live constraint is a Constraint that is controlled by the user or some other control mechanism, partly or completely independent of the velocities and forces in the Scene. This could for instance be the HingeJoint where a JointAxisController instance is used by some automated or user controlled mechanism. This makes the constraint unpredictable for the deactivation system, and once the two Body objects that the constraint is acting upon is deactivated, there is no way for the constraint to start working and reactivate the bodies. By adding the constraint to the live constraints list, the constraint will be monitored and reactivated appropriately. Remember to remove unused constraints with removeLiveConstraint so they do not unnecessarily take up resources.

Parameters:
c -

removeLiveConstraint

void removeLiveConstraint(Constraint c)
Remove a Constraint from the live constraints monitoring list. See addLiveConstraint for details on live constraints.

Parameters:
c - Constraint to be removed
